===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# one time; [[once]]
#: {{zh-x|他 打 了 我 一下。|He hit me '''once'''.}}
# a (short) while; a moment
#: {{zh-x|等 一下|wait '''a moment'''}}
#: {{zh-x|休息 一下|rest '''a while'''}}
#: {{zh-x|抱 一下|give a quick hug}}
